text:
Hello

I've just downloaded http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat-7/v7.0.0-beta/bin/apache-tomcat-7.0.0.zip

If I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps on it and access a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.

Cheers

S. Ali Tokmen
http://ali.tokmen.com/
creator: postmaster@alishomepage.com

text:
Created attachment 25676
Attachment of the log displayed on console when I access a page, I see a NullPointerException
creator: postmaster@alishomepage.com

text: Thanks for the report. This is fixed in trunk and will be included in 7.0.1 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org

text: This is very good news. Thank you very much.
creator: postmaster@alishomepage.com
markt@apache.org
text: *** Bug 49566 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
